Question: This person introduced several acts at Live Aid at the JFK Stadium in July 1985.
Hints: In November 2006, this person began filming his next project, Rob Reiner's The Bucket List, a role for which he shaved his head.
This person lived next door to Marlon Brando for a number of years on Mulholland Drive in Beverly Hills.
This person's twelve Oscar nominations make him the most nominated male actor.
